allow: Bash(netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="CleverCreator Backend" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=9000)

Bash(start cmd /k "title Veo Backend [Port 9000] && ..\\venv\\Scripts\\activate && uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 9000 --reload")
